title: Ambient Video Game Music - Abandoned Monastery
description: Step into the transcendent world of ancient, hushed corridors and the lingering energies of the past with our exclusive collection of 10 ambient music tracks.
longDescription:
Step into the transcendent world of ancient, hushed corridors and the lingering energies of the past with our exclusive collection of 10 ambient music tracks. Each piece is a journey in itself, unfolding over 3 minutes to evoke the profound silence, ethereal atmospheres, and the enigmatic aura associated with abandoned monasteries. Together, they form a rich tapestry of sound spanning 30 minutes, meticulously designed to transport listeners into a realm of deep serenity, contemplation, and haunting beauty.


While the tracks are harmonious in their thematic approach, each one brings a unique facet of the monastery to life. From the soft rustle of fallen leaves in once bustling courtyards, to the distant murmur of prayers from epochs past, the soundscapes conjure vivid imagery and emotion. The emphasis has always been on authenticity and depth, ensuring that listeners are not just hearing, but feeling every note and nuance.


Offered at a reasonable price of $14.99, it's not just music you're acquiring, but an ethereal escape, an opportunity to resonate with the profound echoes of history, and a chance to engage with the subtle whispers of time.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--


Music Preview 1: https://youtu.be/eWL0_d4NLrs

Music Preview 2: https://youtu.be/p8GbMnHtOoc

Music Preview 3: https://youtu.be/5oavn-jcRe4


--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
